description:
At the law firm of Walner Law in Chicago, Illinois, we are fully committed to helping you obtain the justice you seek for the injuries and losses you suffered as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Serving plaintiff personal injury clients throughout the greater Chicago metro region, the attorneys at our law firm possess over 75 years of combined legal experience, and we have achieved unprecedented success advocating on behalf of those adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, dangerous property conditions, defective products, dog bites, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse, birth injuries and other preventable tragedies. In addition, we also represent injured and disabled workers seeking their rightful workers' compensation benefits.

Treating you as a member of our own family, we will fully support you during your difficult time, ensuring you receive the proper medical treatment you need while aggressively pursuing the maximum amount of compensation for the damages you incurred.

To date, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for those we have served, earning our membership in the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum and solidifying our reputation as one of the region's top personal injury practices.

For more information on how Walner Law can best serve your needs and help you obtain the justice you seek, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation, and we offer Spanish-speaking services for our Latino clientele.
